name: Missile Championship
description:
Every generation has its game: TacMan, Super Dario, Room, Fall of Bootie and now this. Your generation wasn't that lucky.
Challenge your friends or your phone (very useful feature for people with no friends) in epic soccer games with cars.
Minutes and minutes of fun for the whole family. If you're a family of two. Like a couple with no kids. Or a widow and her son. Or two orphans. Or whatever.

Features:
• A red car and a blue car you could hardly call pixel art.
• Many scenarios.
• Online matches (if you're not the only one playing in the world).
• Insults you every time you're not a good player.
• Panini.
• ...and many more coming! (maybe!)
